title: Arches National Park: Crossword Puzzle
body: Desert Adaptations Crossword Puzzle       Arches National Park is in the high desert of the Colorado Plateau. It rains only about 4 to 13 inches (10 to 33 centimeters) a year here. To be able to survive in this harsh climate, plants and animals have many adaptations. This crossword puzzle is about some of those plant and animal adaptations.  You can print out the puzzle to complete it. The first letter of each word goes in the square whose number matches the clue number.               Clues fox  evening owl beetle coyote jackrabbit juniper tree sagebrush spadefoot  cactus  Across 4.
